trans-unit.source: Contains information about a part of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> at a specified coordinate.
trans-unit.target: Contém informações sobre uma parte de <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> numa coordenada especificada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The HitTestInfo class, in conjunction with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> is used to determine which part of an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> the user has clicked.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]A classe de HitTestInfo, juntamente com o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A>método do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>é utilizado para determinar que parte de um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>o utilizador tiver clicado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A>

trans-unit.source: The HitTestInfo class contains the location and associated designer that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: A classe de HitTestInfo contém a localização e designer associado que foi clicado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância de um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Associada <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The location on the associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: A localização no associada <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> que foi clicado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The AssociatedDesigner property stores a reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade AssociatedDesigner armazena uma referência para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>associados a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>objeto.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> to reference extended information about the designer associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>para fazer referência a informações expandidas sobre o estruturador associado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounds of the area hit.
trans-unit.target: Devolve os limites de acessos de área.

trans-unit.source: The bounds will describe the area on the screen that was hit, usually the area that encloses the associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Os limites descrevem a área no ecrã que foi atingido, normalmente, a área encloses <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> associados

trans-unit.source: A rectangle that encloses the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> object or an empty rectangle if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> object is not associated with a designer.
trans-unit.target: Um retângulo que encloses o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> objeto ou um retângulo vazio se o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> objeto não está associado um estruturador.

trans-unit.source: Contains information about where the hit occurred.
trans-unit.target: Contém informações sobre onde ocorreram os acessos.

trans-unit.source: Use the HitLocation to determine on what area of the designer the hit occurred.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o HitLocation para determinar em que a área do designer de acessos ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestLocations"></xref> that describes the area hit.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestLocations"> </xref> que descreve o acessos de área.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the hit designer.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o índice do designer acessos.

trans-unit.source: Use the value returned by MapToIndex to determine which designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o valor devolvido pelo MapToIndex para determinar qual designer foi atingido.

trans-unit.source: This is useful for insertion or deletion operations.
trans-unit.target: Isto é útil para operações de inserção ou eliminação.

trans-unit.source: The index of the designer hit by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O índice do designer de acessos pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an empty <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um vazio <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use `Nowhere` to get an empty <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize `Nowhere` obter <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> vazio

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An empty <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a selectable object associated with the hit area.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto selecionável associado à área de acessos.

trans-unit.source: Use `SelectableObject` to get the selectable object associated with the hit area.
trans-unit.target: Utilize `SelectableObject` para obter o objeto selecionável associado à área de acessos.

trans-unit.source: If a designer is associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>, SelectableObject will return the activity associated with the designer, or null reference (`Nothing`) if no designer is associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Se um designer está associado a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>, SelectableObject irá devolver a atividade associada com a referência do estruturador, ou nula (`Nothing`) se nenhum estruturador está associado a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>

trans-unit.source: A selectable object associated with the hit area or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) if no designer is associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto selecionável associado à área de acessos ou uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic) se nenhum estruturador está associado a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the user data associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os dados de utilizador associados a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use UserData to store user information about the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize UserData para armazenar informações de utilizador sobre <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>

trans-unit.source: If no user data has been stored, calling UserData creates a new, empty dictionary for use.
trans-unit.target: Se não existem dados de utilizador estão armazenados, chamar UserData cria um dicionário de novo, vazio para utilização.

trans-unit.source: A new dictionary for user data, or a reference to the existing user data.
trans-unit.target: Um novo dicionário de dados de utilizador ou uma referência para os dados de utilizador existentes.
